duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the repair and maintenance of equipment, including work schedules, service calls, and parts orders.
Provide training and assistance to field service technicians and handle customer complaints.
Promote safety awareness and perform quality control checks on equipment.
Update and maintain equipment service records, handle warranty claims, and commission new equipment.
Prepare various reports related to equipment, fleet status, work orders, inventory management, and financial trending.

education_certification.credential: Extensive experience in the repair and maintenance of diesel engines and/or electric motors, work planning and scheduling, strong understanding of equipment capabilities and safety requirements.
